Wednesday, February 02, 2011

Collective Storytelling - 6 Word Story

A short story in 6 words, written for Collective Storytelling class with Marianne Petit.

Gone. With the car. That bitch.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
